Add a floating action button to scroll to top in ListFragments and StoreFragments

setup different product flavors: local (locally running the app), beta and stable.

Both beta and stable are currently using Crashlytics and thus may not compile unless you're configuring Crashlytics in some way.
show a notification to people participating in the beta that they can opt out on the first launch
